name: Robot Antics
description:
Robot Antics is an arena like, top down shooter, where "enemy" robots will come out of doors to attack you.

This game was made for the Bored Pixels Jam 8 and the Weekly Game Jam - Week 10

This game is also the sequel to my other game Robotics: https://duck-bear.itch.io/robotics

STORY

In this game, you play as a mech who was not fully put together, but has gone online, and with no instructions. All the robots in the facility need you shut down, but you were just created, why would they do that?

RUSH HOUR

This game runs on a wave system, every five waves, rush hour will commence, flooding the room with many enemies; good luck.

ABILITIES

There are 5 playable abilities:

  1. Clear
  2. Boost
  3. Discharge
  4. Bomb
  5. Minigun

Select a ability and survive!

CONTROLS

  • this game uses controller input if a controller is plugged in

Keyboard: Use WASD and Arrow Keys to move, use the Mouse to rotate, shoot, and use your ability.

Controller:  Use the joysticks to move and rotate, use the triggers to shoot and use your ability.
